thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Kevin Hart Reveals Whether He's Ready to Have More Kids With Wife Eniko Parrish
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Kevin Hart Reveals Whether He's Ready to Have More Kids With Wife Eniko Parrish

author: Jennifer Drysdale
title: EXCLUSIVE: Kevin Hart Reveals Whether He's Ready to Have More Kids With Wife Eniko Parrish
text: EXCLUSIVE: Kevin Hart Reveals Whether He's Ready to Have More Kids With Wife Eniko Parrish by Jennifer Drysdale 3:43   Playing EXCLUSIVE: Kevin Hart Reveals Whether He's Ready to Have More Kids With Wife Eniko Parrish Kevin Hart is "enjoying the new steps in marriage" -- but is he ready for more kids? ET's Kevin Frazier caught up with the 37-year-old actor on the Philadelphia set of his new film, Untouchable , where he opened up about his life since his August wedding with Eniko Parrish... but first offered his congratulations to another couple. WATCH: Inside Kevin Hart and Eniko Parrish's Big Wedding Day -- See the Pics! "First of all, that's incredible. [I] couldn't be happier for Beyonce," Hart said of the singer, currently expecting twins with her husband, Jay Z. "I mean, me and my wife are in an amazing place," he added. "We're still newlyweds, we're still fresh in this marriage so we're enjoying the new steps in marriage." A post shared by Kevin Hart (@kevinhart4real) on Feb 14, 2017 at 6:45am PST RELATED: Kevin Hart Admits to Chelsea Handler That He Messed Up His First Marriage With an estimated net worth of $87.5 million, Hart is definitely in a good place financially to start adding to his family, but with upcoming projects like The Secret Life of Pets 2 , a book tour in June, a comedy tour next year and the Move With Hart cross-country workout initiative, the comedian says he might not have the time right now. "It's about having the patience to deal with another kid," confessed the father of 12-year-old Heaven and 9-year-old Hendrix. "See, my kids are old enough where I can say, 'Go do something,' and they go do something. I gotta make sure I have the patience to follow a baby." A post shared by Kevin Hart (@kevinhart4real) on Mar 11, 2017 at 5:20pm PST RELATED: Kevin Hart Rules Forbes' Ranking of Highest-Paid Comedians -- Find Out Who Else Made The List "That age of baby is just calling you all the time and that's a tough age. 'Dad, dad, dad, dad, dad, dad,' and then you finally turn around and they go, 'Look!' You called me 20 times for that?" Hart continued. "You gotta make sure you're not at the point you're not gonna be frustrated, so I'm waiting to get all this work out, and when I got some time to relax, we'll talk about the family time." Hart is enjoying watching his kids grow up, however. "As a dad, its everything," he shared. "I mean, you know, I'm over here struggling with my levels of cool now. [Hendrix] is not the little kid anymore. He's starting to understand how to do things on his own and hes asking for certain things... It was definitely a proud moment for me to see and realize that he is growing up to be a young version of me." RELATED: Kevin Hart Shares Gorgeous Honeymoon Pics From St. Barts As for Parrish? "She's enjoying all this right now," he said, noting that she even enjoys the "Brillo pad"-like hair he's rocking for his latest role. "This is how I know she really loves me." A post shared by Kevin Hart (@kevinhart4real) on Mar 1, 2017 at 2:02pm PST Untouchable is set to hit theaters in 2018.
